meanings.definition: A person or device that waters plants.
meanings.sent1: The waterer gently sprinkled water on the thirsty flowers.
meanings.sent2: The waterer filled the watering can to take care of the garden.
meanings.sent3: The waterer accidentally sprayed water on themselves while tending to the plants.
meanings.sent4: The diligent waterer was like a lifesaver to the wilting plants.
meanings.sent5: The dedicated waterer made sure every plant received the right amount of water.

meanings.definition: A person who provides water for animals.
meanings.sent1: The kind waterer made sure the animals had enough to drink every day.
meanings.sent2: The waterer carried buckets of water to the thirsty horses in the barn.
meanings.sent3: The waterer playfully splashed water at the animals to cool them down.
meanings.sent4: The waterer's care was like a refreshing oasis in the desert for the animals.
meanings.sent5: The diligent waterer ensured the animals never went thirsty.

meanings.definition: A device used for watering plants.
meanings.sent1: The automatic waterer released water at set intervals for the plants.
meanings.sent2: The waterer had different nozzles for spraying water in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The waterer accidentally sprayed water all over the room when it malfunctioned.
meanings.sent4: The innovative waterer was like a magical wand for the garden.
meanings.sent5: The efficient waterer made plant care much easier.
